txt.en:
'You have aided us beyond what I could have ever imagined, [placeholder]. Walstow will still have many fights ahead of it, but the Orcs no longer lurk just outside our borders.

'The time has come for you to return to Fastred. I am sure that Snowbourn faces new threats in your absence, and there will be much for you to do upon your return. My men and I can hold here for now, thanks to you.

'It was an honour, [placeholder]. Go with our respect.'

'Ah, you have returned. Am I to assume Walstow stands strong?

'Many peculiar things have occurred since you left us to aid my Thane. The traitor has been left to rot in our prison, but yet more threats face us every day.

'You have returned at a most opportune time... I think.'
Winsig is heartened that Walstow will now be able to stand against the Orc-invasion.
Fastred can be found inside the mead-hall of Snowbourn.
